name: tm91
effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user gathers all its light energy
and releases it in one shot. It may
also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

The user gathers all its light energy
and releases it in one shot. It may
also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority
moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for
five turns.
